website_summaries.verdict: Users who need to transfer from a walker to the toilet will appreciate this model's padded handles and secure fit on the seat.
pros: Attaches firmly to seat without tools
Adjusts to fit many seat sizes
cons: Locking mechanism is plastic, not durable
Center hole is smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: It works depending on how stable the person is using it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father to help with some mobility issues. The locking bolt on the front does not apply enough pressure to maintain the entire seat stable at all times. This seems to be a design flaw. Also, the locking bolt is plastic and the nut is plastic, so at best this is a temporary product. The handles are aluminum and appear to be comfortable. If the person using it pushes down evenly with the handles, then the seat will work fine for them. Any uneven pressure will cause the seat to flip and your elderly person is on the ground. I wouldn't order it again or recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I like it and hope my 99 year old dad will like it when he comes to stay. Easy to install, fits my regular size bowl, but i think it can work with elongated too. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: maurice chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy and satisfied purchasing the Deluxe Locking Raised Toilet. Having a total knee replacement surgery is very difficult but this product truly helped me during my recovery. Plus, it is money back guarantee. But I can not find any reason to return it. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BPangaerang63

customer_reviews.title: I found an even better seat (adjustable handles) at Home Depot for only $35
customer_reviews.text: Lock tight latch refused to loosen so would not work. Called seller and was told someone would call back "shortly;" no one did. According to their voicemail, the company has been affected by Hurricane Irma (so I can understand some delay) but "We're sorry; no one will be able to help" would have been a more honest and helpful response. Luckily, I found an even better seat (adjustable handles) at Home Depot for only $35. The basic construction of the two items are so similar, I swear that they're made by the same company. The Home Depot seat is also returnable and has a limited lifetime warranty. My husband says it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: A necessity if you have hip replacement surgery!
customer_reviews.text: After having hip replacement surgery, I was looking for something to elevate the toilet so that I could maintain a 90” angle. I purchased a cheaper toilet seat, which was unstable. After struggling for two days, I purchased this unit. Wow! What a difference! It attaches to the bowl in 30 seconds. This toilet seat is very stable and comfortable. Recovering from hip surgery is difficult enough, without worrying about falling off the toilet. This seat fit our elongated bowl very well. I can pop this on whenever I need it and remove it in a flash, so that others can use the toilet. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: alice pavlo

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Elevated Seat for Post-Op or Limited Mobility People
customer_reviews.text: What do I like the most? I've just returned home from the hospital yesterday after having a 2-part major back surgery of my lower back. Bending, Lifting, and Twisting are VERY LIMITED. The commode in the hospital was quite low and uncomfortable. My husband easily added this elevated toilet seat to our toilet in about one minute (another plus). It is comfortable to use, very stable and secure, fits perfectly on our elongated toilet, and has strong stable arm grips. It has exceeded our expectations! There is nothing NOT TO LIKE. The price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product at a Great Price...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I, both in our 60's, found this to be a quality product at a great price. It was the perfect solution to post-surgical convalescing at home. The support handles are very sturdy and the seat mounts securely to the toilet. The raised toilet seat removes easily for cleaning. We would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zag

customer_reviews.title: Go Grandma Go (by yourself)
customer_reviews.text: Grandma was using a freestanding 'over the commode' chair that doubled as her shower chair; lots of maintenance there (alot!). Now I can dedicate that chair to just showering. The VIVE raised toilet seat is comfortable to sit on for her and comes with stabilizing side rails which are removable if not needed. The seat safely locks down to our elongated toilet seat WITHOUT wobbling or removing existing lid or seat. It actually makes cleanup for me much easier. Very happy I found this product and it is helping keep grandma more independent while using "the facilities."
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Fern

customer_reviews.title: Can tip loose from the toilet. Did noy feel safe using .
customer_reviews.text: Not stable enough. If weight is not evenly distributed over the two handles, then the seat tips and comes loose from the toilet. Instead, I should have bought a safer version, though much more expensive, where the safety handles were attached to 4 legs that went to the floor. I did not fall in the bathroom, only because I had someone with me when the seat dislodged.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome, not great
customer_reviews.text: This is really wide and tall and the opening could be wider. Feels almost too high off toilet bowl and I worry how safe and stable it will be with continued use. Also, you have to first remove the existing toilet seat and lid to install it properly which I dread will probably be just as hard to put back once I don't, hopefully, need the riser anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Too Low
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this model, although it does measure five inches, is much too low. If you have arthritis in your knees, you will have to bend your knees excessively to the point of real pain. The arm rests are also much too low and make very loud crackling and crunching noises when in use. I never write negative reviews however, in this case, when pain is involved, I would suggest trying another product, as Amazon offers many choices.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Outwin

customer_reviews.title: There are no problems with the seat you do not have to send it back
customer_reviews.text: My sister had knee surgery and needed one, this is perfect There are no problems with the seat you do not have to send it back is in a come in bathroom and it is quite OK if others use it. It was super easy to put together the top may slide a bit at times but it’s easy to just slide back over the handrails on the side are good and easy to use. This toilet seat does exactly what it is advertised to do great by little more expensive than what I wanted to spend but it’s worth it thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ali3

customer_reviews.title: This raised toilet seat is perfect for men or women who have difficulty in standing ...
customer_reviews.text: This raised toilet seat is perfect for men or women who have difficulty in standing from a seated position. The arm bars are strong and support the person when rising. The seat is also easy to put together, and it is stable when placing it on the toilet itself. The toilet seat cleans up nicely, leaving no discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this raised toilet seat. I had a different riser a couple of years ago for some previous surgeries and it was so unstable even though I paid top $$. This seat is SO easy to install; is very good quality; and it's very sturdy. I highly recommend it. It works with or without your existing toilet seat. But if you remove the existing toilet seat, the Vive seat is easier to install and easier to clean. FYI....I am 5' 4" and my toes barely touch the floor while in full sitting position. The handles work extremely well, as they are positioned just right.
customer_reviews.author: SonomaSue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 72 year old who has just undergone my first of two hip replacements. I am known for doing my research on anything I purpose, and this was no exception. I wanted ease of installation, I got it, I wanted stability, I got it. I wanted easy to clean, I got it. There is no feature that I wanted that this commode did not have. I am also known for not settling for less, and I didn't. PS the arm handles are a critical feature. They are easy to install and I relied on them to be stable, and they were.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Size matters. Not for hip replacement.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with seller or quality of product. I bought this prior to a hip replacement and it the product is too small for me or that situation. In terms of quality - the product was well made, clipped together easily, fit an elongated toilet bowel ans was stable. The riser is easy to remove or replace and the plastic cleaned well. I would not recommend for a person much over 170#.
customer_reviews.author: chemist

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This product broke the frist time I tried to install it. The main screw which attaches the raised seat to the toliet bowl is made of plastic. I didnt really tighten the bolt all that much, the screw just snaped which instantly rendered the raised seat useless. Other then that this product seems great. If they replaced the plastic screw with a metal one I would happily buy a new one. I'd even pay a bit extra if its a matter of manufacturing cost. The plastic screw just seems like a connor that should not have been cut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on and easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: helpful temporary use after injuring my back and could not bend-would not want to use in my powder room permanently-others may not want to use-easy to clean, no installation, just placed on Kohler Raphael elongated toilet seat-no wobbling-stayed on securely-wish toilet seat companies,including Kohler, offered for sale raised toilets higher than the ones offered now-(only 1 and 1/2 inches higher) - only existing, more permanent option-" toilet risers "which Amazon offers for sale
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fit our oval shape toilet snug and tight.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, sturdy, good stable installation. Had to remove the existing toilet seat due to the tight fit but that was an anticipated possibility. Purchased for healing process post-op total knee replacement. Some body parts just seem to wear out faster on these older models.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Climbs up back when tighted
customer_reviews.text: Great item but a few things need fixed. When trying to tighten up the screw to make the seat solid it climbs up the backside of the toilet. Because you can't have this it is now a bit tipsy on the toilet. BUT - if you just need a riser and don't care if it is tight fitting then works great. I could not rate it higher because it is for my 87 year old mother who needs as much stabling as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Tall Great for Knee Replacement Recovery
customer_reviews.text: Like everything else I purchase I do my research. I purchased 2 raised toilet seats, one for downstairs and one for the master bedroom. I needed these following a total knee replacement and I don't know what I would have down without them. I felt save , secure, and my knee pain was so diminished by using these. I love the side handles because they made standing much easier. Hopefully I won't need them again but I'm storing them away just in case.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for gentlemen who sit.
customer_reviews.text: The hole was too small for my husband to aim and urinate while sitting. Even scooted all the way back, his p** was still over the front of the seat, and there way no way to get it aimed in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: KateG

customer_reviews.title: This is #1 for #2!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 90 year old father that needed help to stand. This fits perfectly on either a round or enlongated toilet. This was the only seat that added at least 5 inches in height. The handles are very secure and installation was easy. I recommend this seat to be used with standard height toilets to make them a safe place to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DaleTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: This raised toilet seat did not fit my husband who is of average weight. His butt did not fit between the handles which made the seat useless. He just had complete knee replacement and needed it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Simon

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased With Product
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with product. The tightening knob does not work. Worked with customer service with no resultion. Going to look for another one one soon at a local store. When i received it, we needed it asap. My husband came home from having a hip replacement surgery. Did not have time to mail back for a refund. It can sit on toilet seat and he is using it but is not stable. The safety bars and seat itself are great but the tightening of the seat is a major part. We use the walker too for my husband to have additional security.
customer_reviews.author: awesome!! addicted!!.

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a difficult week!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 90 year old mother that was visiting us for a week. Our toilet was lower than the one she had at home and was experiencing trouble getting up. We ordered it from amazon on Saturday afternoon and got it on Monday. It literally took less than 2 minutes to install. Super easy! We have an elongated toilet and it secured well. It is going to be easy to remove and store away for next time she visits. Mother loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Essential Details Lacking
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I cannot use the handles to fully push myself up. Hopefully I will not need them following my hip replacement surgery. I also bought the Vive vacuum wall handles only to learn that they will not work on my bathroom tiles because they are less than 4" squares. In both cases, the information provided in your product descriptions did not point out these limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crawford

customer_reviews.title: the product is very nice with one exception
customer_reviews.text: the product is very nice with one exception. I attached it to my elongated toilet seat, and sat on it to test it. Front to back was very secure. side to side it lifted right off the seat. I was very disappointed because it is extremely well made. The company was very nice and gave me a full refund immediately. I would definately do business with them again on another product. Thank you VIVE Health.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Who Thought to Get Excited Over a Toilet Seat?
customer_reviews.text: I'm having hip replacement surgery soon and the commode I have is very low. Even before surgery it's been tough to get down and back up. Now it's a dream. Oh, the little things in life that make us happy. This is perfect and I'm thinking of leaving it on permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Anneke

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for men
customer_reviews.text: This riser has a small opening and is fine for women who sit on it but for my husband who cannot stand to urinate it is very unsatisfactory. As his condition declines he can't get the urine into the toilet...it runs out the channel and onto his pants or floor, This whole issue could have been avoided by making the channel in front slant back toward the toilet....I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Judyc135

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well constructed riser
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat in preparation for hip replacement. I am still waiting for the hip replacement but the seat riser arrived in one day. The riser and handles are sturdy and was easy to assemble and install. It fit the elongated toilet with no special adjustments to assembly. I have tried it out and handles are helpful for anyone with joint problems. Since the riser fits inside the lip of the toilet, you are losing some of the diameter of the hole. This and the height will take some getting used to. A little target practice and it should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: A must if you’re having knee surgery!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a ton of research I ordered this and have not been disappointed! It was so easy to install and very very stable. I would recommend that you only install one of the arm rails. If your a little wide like me, it would be uncomfortable. After a total knee replacement this was key!! Makes the toilet high enough so I do not have to bend my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Help my mom after surgery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my mom needed after her surgery. It provides a good support and able to set it up without hassle. Gave my mom the confidence to be able to do her stuff on her own and we took it around for her to use when she was not at home.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Having hip surgery soon so I ordered this after reading the reviews. I am 6'1" and needed a taller seat. Height is great. The product is of good quality and it is super easy to put on and take off. Side handles can be taken off if you want. The seat is a tool to help with getting on and off the toilet. I take it off once a week to clean the underside and to clean my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 105 year old mother. It's an easy transfer from her walker to the seat due to the sturdy adjustable handles on the seat. I tried several others that I returned, but this one works well on an elongated bowl.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this seat. It was very easy to assemble and installs on the toilet in less than a minute. It can be removed for cleaning quickly. The arms were a requirement and the seat seems quite stable. It seems a little strange to me to be so delighted with a toilet riser but when I first went looking though Amazon's huge offering I just had no idea what to pick. I'm very glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Kilbride

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and install.
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced another that was a nightmare to clean. It is easily installed or removed for cleaning. It is from what I can tell well constructed and hopefully will last a long time. I am 83 and had knee replacement surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Roge

customer_reviews.title: Secures very well and is very stable.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect this portable raised toilet seat to be so secure or stable as it is. I have to use all my weight to push down to get off the toilet seat, and have heard so many horror stories of other products that broke loose resulting in an embarrassing if not injurious fall. This puppy works perfectly! Purchased it for when we travel. So glad to have found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M.

customer_reviews.title: Made an old man happy
customer_reviews.text: My Father-in-law has a real tough time getting around. Getting up and down is very difficult for him. I purchased this for him for when he comes to visit. He liked it so much that he took it home with him. This gives him a little more independence and dignity back. It is very easy to take off and put on. It is very stable and he was able to get on and off the toilet without assistance. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Markg1490

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say I was not happy with this seat at al. All the measurments were correct yet it would not fit securely on the toilet seat making it too dangerous for my hisband to be able to use it. I had to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Pikulski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & very secure.
customer_reviews.text: Used after hip replacement surgery, attaches quickly and securely to my Kohler Portrait toilet with an elongated bowl. I personally could have used a slightly higher rise, the first week was tough squatting that low, but the product was secure and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: bob0505

customer_reviews.title: The handles are a great addition!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for post hip replacement surgery. It's simple to use, takes seconds to attach or detach & is very stable. I'm just days post op, & I can easily do this by myself. Can't recommend more highly!
customer_reviews.author: bbkf41

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENND
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a raised toilet seat due to surgery ot other medical reasons, this is my choice. The seat is large, the handles are sturdy and stationary.and it fit our oval toilet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: smcanena1963

customer_reviews.title: Based upon my evaluation you need to decide if it will work for you.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. It was about $70. I think it's a fair price. It's acceptable quality. The only problem is it's not easy to removing it every time by mother's uses it. It's a bit heavy. So it remains on, continuously. That means you can't put the seat lid & cover down.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to prepare for my 3 tumor removal from my thigh. I practiced with it for a week before my surgery. It's pretty helpful. The height helps with sitting and getting up, as are the handles. If you don't get up balanced, there is a chance the seat will unhook. So I'm especially careful sitting and standing. For the most part, this was a great purchase for my temporary needs while healing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kyles

customer_reviews.title: Figure out your patient's needs first...
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality, it did not fit my patient's need. It significantly lessened the actual portal space and because of the design, did not provide enough room for the patient to reach around well and get refuse in the bowl. The height was good and it was otherwise comfortable. This was more a case of trail and error. If your just looking for some extra height, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Ilnicki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet seat replacement
customer_reviews.text: Instillation was tool-free as advertised. It is comfortable with safety features for those who need assistance with standing up or sitting down. This seat increases the sitting area of the toilet and it is easy to clean. I wish all toilet seats were like this. The additional 5 inch height is a luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous as my girlfriend ordered this for me as I just had back surgery. The hospital's potty went over the commode which was easy but the lid would hit me in the back and that scared me. This on the other had is very convenient and has the two handles on the side which makes it great to ease in and out of the seat. Plus it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Understand your toilet dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: As several of the reviews pointed out, the height of the lip of your toilet bowl is THE critical dimension! There is a bevel lead on the raised toilet seat that no way will allow it to even flex to fit. So, it came out of the box and went right back in the box. Unfortunately my husband comes home from rehab tomorrow and we will have to make do until I can find something that fits our toilet. Trying to avoid having to also buy a new toilet...
customer_reviews.author: bsm2020

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elongated toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: My old house had the regular toilet shape, this new house has the elongated seat. I needed to purchase a new raised toilet seat for handicapped height and stability. This product works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: SuSuz

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Especially useful while recovering from some injuries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my elderly parents were visiting for 2 weeks and my dad had had hip surgery 6 weeks prior to his visit (and it turns out also had a hernia). My mom had also broken her hip a year prior, though she's doing fantastic. Regardless this product has been great! My dad says it has helped him more than the product he has been using at his home. You don't realize how much you need something like this, until you need something like this. Coincidentally, I had knee surgery 3 months ago and although I managed, this would have made life a little easier for me right after the surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend's grandmother. She needed assistance getting on and off the toilet and it was very embarrassing to her and the designated person that assisted her. After this products arrival,she was able to use the restroom by herself for the first time in 2 years. Great product,extremely fast arrival,and a must have for anyone that has difficulty sitting down on or standing up from a toilet seat due to age or disability!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gurnée

customer_reviews.title: Stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed this after bilateral knee replacement surgery. Did the job and I don't have any complaints. If you need a raised toilet seat and can't borrow one, get this one and then donate it!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure to Ask if these fit the Brand you have.
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice, but would not fit my toilet. Never used. My fault in not returning but still have in box. There is not a top riser that will fit a Koehler toilet. Have been trying to decide what do with it now that I've waited this long.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality products. Thank you Vive!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to have those extra inches in seat height. It’s made my first week home from the hospital much less painful. I have a few of your products now and I’m very pleased with the quality and function of each of them. I’ll put Vive in the search box when I need my next adaptation made.
customer_reviews.author: KSLemon

customer_reviews.title: A huge help
customer_reviews.text: We took this on vacation to help a handicapped elderly person. It was so easy to install (did not have to remove the existing seat)! The arms on the side allowed them to easily stand up again. Great product. Well made, sturdy and easy to clean with a Clorox wipe.
customer_reviews.author: FORREST R JERKINS

customer_reviews.title: Stable and perfect height
customer_reviews.text: I needed a raised toilet seat after a knee injury and the Vive brand worked very well. I had looked at other brands/types that were only 3 1/2 inches high, but i decided on the 5 inch instead. Am so glad that I did. The handles are stable and do not wobble. When my injury heals, I think I will still use for ease of use with arthritic knees.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: This product was so easy to install. We have an elongated toilet and this fit perfectly. No problem at all with inserting the handles and installing. Great product overall. I would recommend this to anyone, family included!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Avakian

customer_reviews.title: Good product would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used when my 100 yr old Mother stayed with me and it was very helpful for her. No problem installing & would recommend for someone who has elderly people staying for a visit or living with you. Cheaper than buying a new toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Take a seat and let me tell you about this great product
customer_reviews.text: Grandmal loves it, Easy to put together, and easy to take off in case guest come over. Great for older people or anyone that has a problem getting down or up from the toilet. Good luck to you!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits securely in a large round toilet bowl. Older ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits securely in a large round toilet bowl. Older round toilet bowls will not accommodate this seat. I know you all don't manufacture this product, but perhaps you can pass this comment on: We wonder why there is a space left between the foam around the handle and the white plastic seat----that cold metal isn't a pleasant sensation! We covered it with gray pipe insulation.
customer_reviews.author: scp

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: we have not yet used it enough to really know how it will do in the long run. It installed easily and seemed secure. The fact that we don't have to remove the seat was a big plus. The user was able to use the handles to assist her and again it felt secure.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Item description contradictory!
customer_reviews.text: This description for this seat on Amazon states it will fit over existing seat. Upon opening the box and reading instructions it clearly states that existing seat must be REMOVED. Now unsure if I will install or return. Thoroughly aggravated.
customer_reviews.author: Anita D. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Testing product  I am totally pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I am 6 ft 3inches tall and easy looking for a seat extender to help me get up since I am still weak just learning to wak again. This unit fit the bill perfectly. The handles are helpful and nicely padded an as mentioned the seat is comfortable. Much more than my original. Easy to install and solid. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TSS

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the cheap drug store seat, it is worth the extra cost. It's each to install, and very comfortable and feels very secure. My knees are very painful and sitting down is difficult, so this is making that part of my day easier. I will need it anyway, after knee replacement surgery. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this seat to be completely stable on the toilet in my apartment. I had to stop using it. It is dissappment.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrell

customer_reviews.title: Great option instead of installing rails
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install, rocks abit but secure. I wish it had come in different height and with a lid for the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Niky

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install on the toliet. Helps my husband in the bathroom upon returning home from rehab. Only gave 4 stars because it is a little wobbly when moving from side to side. If you push on handles and come straight up, it works good. Not sure how to secure any other way to make a little more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Raised toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Overall the raised toilet seat worked for my 92 year old mom. The fit is not perfect. The tab in the back portion does not fit under the rim of her toilet so the seat is not as secure as I would have liked. The seat itself is just what I expected and is a great idea for those needing this.
customer_reviews.author: Munchkin

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: You'll need some strength in your hands and fingers to put the handles in but then it's all good from there. It's a little narrower than i would like it to be Probably wouldn't be a problem if i took the handles off. But really helps my knees by being elevated
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Works Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unit was delivered in 2 days as advertised. Works great on both oval and round toilets. Easy assembly (3 minutes). Easy to put on and take off toilet! Just turn the dial at the front of the seat and it will tighten it down. Do the reverse to take it off. Seriously takes only 30 seconds to mount and dismount the elevated seat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mulvaney

customer_reviews.title: Good Seat
customer_reviews.text: Good seat. Easy to install and the scoop out in front makes it easier to use. My wife just had a hip replaced and it's perfect for her and I can use it too. I'm 6'1" and 220 lbs - it's fine. We use it without the arms - good either way.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised just as I was discharged from the hospital. Excellent gizmo which allows safe use of toilet while recovering from foot surgery. It’s even better than the one used in the hospital, where urine could escape out the front. This one is well engineered, easy to clean, and very sturdy. Bravo!”
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stiegler

customer_reviews.title: Locking Bolt not secure
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product except for the Locking Bolt is not secure enough, If you try to raise up off of the seat using only 1 handle the seat will slide sideways and could cause a serious fall. I have tightened the Bolt very tight several times due to slipping. My advise is to keep a check on bolt to make sure seat is always secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The raised height and security arms were very beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: Just had knee replacement surgery. Toilet seat was a big help. Very easy to install. Not really wide enough between arm supports for hips. However we made it work. Would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Troell

customer_reviews.title: On time and on toilet.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has Parkinson’s and has trouble getting up off a regular toilet seat. This 5” raised seat will help her and my back from trying to lift her off the lower seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dools

customer_reviews.title: Makes life with sore knees much easier.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. Because of his bad knees, he had great difficulty getting up. Now, no problem whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Shermane Gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: VERY helpful. Easy to install and stable as it sits right on top of the porcelain bowl. We clean with Windex disinfectant. Allows affected person to stay home alone without fear of being stranded, unable to get off the toilet. Very glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: RDP, SD

customer_reviews.title: Solid "locking" mechanism
customer_reviews.text: My mother recently returned home from a lengthy hospital stay. The riser she had did not lock down nor did it have optional handles. This seat locks down very solid so she is able to move from the toilet right onto the tub transfer bench without having to stand up again. We are using a handle on the right side but not the left. I highly recommend this toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: kidsnwork

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance on Vive
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance earlier this year and ordered this product from Vive for my mom although I'd never heard of this company. We're very satisfied. It's a well-made product. Since I removed the regular toilet seat and lid, the raised seat is very easy to put on the toilet bowl & to remove for cleaning. The raised seat has really made a difference for my mom. I can't comment on the arm supports, though, since I didn't attach them (We already had a free-standing frame in place around the back & sides of the toilet which provide support when getting up.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit high so keep that in mind for shorter people. The elevation is great for talker people.
customer_reviews.text: It depends on what shape toilet you have. It fits well on standard toilets, is secure, and a great help in traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Farren

customer_reviews.title: she now can comfortably lower herself onto the seat instead of crashing down ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this for my daughter-law's mother who is almost completely handicapped from a muscular disease. This seat arrived on July 2nd as promised, installed right away and her trips to the bathroom are so much easier for her. Because she is rapidly losing strength in her legs, she now can comfortably lower herself onto the seat instead of crashing down and hurting her spine. Her husband who is her care giver stated that his job is now so much easier with this seat. It has added comfort and ease to their devastating situation. It is well made and very sturdy after attaching to the toilet bowl. A five star rating for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Newrones

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this toilet seat was NOT elongated, and the opening was a even smaller diameter than our regular elevated toilet seat. This was recommended by our OT, but I suspect that she just Googled it without actually seeing one. What a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Mary Melnick

customer_reviews.title: Stable and firm elevated seat.
customer_reviews.text: My mother broke her hip recently and needed a raised seat. I was a little skeptical about the fit of this seat. This thing is way more solid than I thought was possible for a universal seat. It fit my mother's elongated toilet firmly. I do check it for snugness every time I visit but it hasn't budged yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband and he is very pleased with it. Other men might be interested in this too, particularly older gentleman, who have an issue with their scrotum hitting the toilet water when using a regular size toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I use a wheelchair, and this seat has been a tremendous help for me. It is extremely sturdy and highly recommended. No tools are required to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C

customer_reviews.title: Good stable seat
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase for this type of toilet seat. My searches paid off. Very stable and secure. My wife appreciated the raised level and sturdiness of the attachment to the kohler fixture.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, secure but hard to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’ 4” and 265 lbs and it was impossible to urinate and have a BM at the same time because the hole is just too small. Also I had to clean off the product after each use and when I removed it the bottom need very thorough cleaning as well. Support was great: installation was fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seat might be a little too high for very petite elderly people
customer_reviews.text: Every thing is perfect but the seat is quite firm so additional washable doughnut shaped padding would be desirable for those with minimal body fat
customer_reviews.author: BBH

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and stable once securely installed. Height is adequate for most individuals but the handles would feel more comfortable if they were about 1-2 inches taller. The major problem with this seat is the width between the bars. Even a women's size 18 backside is a tight squeeze and anyone larger would find the fit impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Has really helped my mom - although she's so short her legs dangle. But it clearly does the trick and gives me a sense of peace. As mentioned before, it's not always easy to get under this seat to clean off the attached toilet, but can be done w/out much effort. I feel it's much safer for her than the kind that go over the commode and are attached to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonitw

customer_reviews.title: Help for independent toileting.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit on my toilet. Seems very secure. Love the armrests for helping me get up. That was my biggest problem. I am 5'4" and probably the shortest person who should use the raised seat since my feet just do rest flat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S Hammett

customer_reviews.title: Easy east easy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! SUPER EASY to install (except the directions tell you to screw the knob in the wrong d3oirection to tighten.) Works perfectly for my semi disabled mother in law. Highly recommend for that extra height and the handles are the perfect boost needed to raise yourself up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find this!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this product! It fits both standard and the newer elongated toilets in our house. We purchased it for traveling when staying with friends or in a hotel when we cannot get a handicap bathroom. I finally found a Vera Bradley zippered bag with dimensions to hold this, so it is not identifiable when we are traveling! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and uninstall.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is easy to install and uninstall to change bathrooms if needed. Very helpful for someone who has just had hip replacement surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: I am having hip replacement surgery in 2 weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am having hip replacement surgery in 2 weeks and will need a raised toilet seat at that time. This seat fits our toilet perfectly and stays put. It will be a big help when I need it after surgery. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jane frantz

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to install on an elongated toilet. The rear does not completely engage on an American Standard Champion 4, but that just makes it easier to pull out for cleaning. It's still completely stable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Melko

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy seat with great grips.
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy toilet seat cover, handles a low and perfect for one to get a good grip and lift themselves. It’s perfect for that situation.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for anyone with an infirmity
customer_reviews.text: This has been exactly what we needed; so grateful for this raised toilet. My husband is frail with cancer and could not lift himself up. I can't help as he is so much bigger but with this we no longer have a problem. One less headache in such a difficult time. It's easy to install and very well made. Could not be better.
customer_reviews.author: Margarite O

customer_reviews.title: You may not need to remove the toilet seat lid. Investigate before your remove lid.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet seat riser work perfectly with the old round commode in the studio apt I was renting near the hospital after heart transplant. It Was a life saver because it lifted me higher than my center of gravity and allowed me to get up off the toilet without damaging my sutures or my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brock
